items.text:
Kordo told you that when the Rangers first explored the Valley, they
set up outposts every few kilometers. They had deliberately placed
some in the most inhospitable locations, assuming that would be
where they would be needed the most.

Pushing aside another curtain of moss and cobwebs, you see one
of those forlorn outposts before you. The building has sunk deep
into the swamp. Between the grime-caked walls and the hydraworms
that seem to be inhabiting it, it's clear that no Ranger has visited this
outpost in quite some time.
